task.title: Adding new columns to a matrix

taskbody.prereq: The following steps assume that you have a matrix displayed in your editor.

step.cmd: From the Outline view, drag and drop the attribute to be displayed in an new column to the Additional Column(s) area.
step.stepresult: The new column appears in Additional Column(s).

step.cmd: From the Properties view, change the additional column properties if needed.
step.info: See section for the properties detail of an additional column.

step.cmd: Repeat the above steps each time an additional column is required.
